text: 7.28 Hib 2.10, 5.1-2, 5.9 Chɨn nopun, kɨli takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨdek gɨl, bɨ ogɨnap bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl okok yenɨgel agɨl, kɨlop aglɨpal. Kɨlop aglɨpal anɨb okok, kɨli kɨles ma mɨdebal. God pen takaw ne kɨdeyɨl, yepɨs ma apin nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin ak, ne Ñɨne nop aglak. Aglek, ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl, bɨ teplep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl pel pelnep yenɨgab.
